revised_title: A Description of a Fiery Mushroom
tldr: Mr. Lister discovered a unique type of mushroom that produces a milky juice much hotter than pepper. The mushroom is large, round, and has a thick, fleshy stalk. It is found in Marton woods and is full of juice, which attracts fly maggots and snails. The mushroom has a strong affinity with Euphorbium and may have medicinal uses.
